00036 using namespace cwchess;

00038 Glib::RefPtr<Glib::MainLoop> main_loop;
00039 
00040 void open_finished(size_t len)
00041 {
00042   std::cout << "Total size read: " << len << '\n';
00043   main_loop->quit();
00044 }
00045 
00046 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00047 {
00048   Debug(debug::init());
00049   if (!Glib::thread_supported())
00050     Glib::thread_init();
00051   Gio::init();
00052 
00053   char const* infile = filename;
00054   if (argc > 1)
00055     infile = argv[1];
00056   Glib::RefPtr<pgn::Database> pgn_data_base = pgn::DatabaseSeekable::open(infile, sigc::ptr_fun(&open_finished));
00057   main_loop = Glib::MainLoop::create(false);
00058   main_loop->run();
00059 }
